name: pipe hat
notes:
sizes: (1) 2 
head measurement: (cm)
(53-56) 57-60

materials: 
drops nepal (35% alpaca, 65% wool, 50g/75m)

quantity (70) 80 g

knit with one strand of yarn

needles: circular needles size 5 mm, cable length recommended 40 cm and 5 mm double pointed needles for decreasing.
 
additional materials needed:
6 markers / scissors / measuring tape / tapestry needle (with a rounded tip).

knitting tension: 22 stitches in width and 26 rows in height with stocking stitch 10 x 10 cm. 
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
